description: A Zoan-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to transform into a human hybrid and a full human. When eaten by a reindeer like Chopper, it grants human intelligence and the ability to speak, as well as various hybrid forms.

users.circumstances: Chopper ate the fruit as a young reindeer, gaining human intelligence and speech but being rejected by both reindeer and humans.

abilityReveals.description: Chopper's human hybrid form, which gives him enhanced intelligence and his iconic cute appearance. This is his default form after eating the Hito Hito no Mi.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: First appearance in the anime when Chopper is helping treat the Straw Hats at Drum Castle.

abilityReveals.description: A glimpse of Chopper's strongest and most dangerous transformation. This form is massive and powerful but not fully explained in this episode.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: First appearance in the anime, though it's not fully used or explained at this point.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.description: Allows Chopper to transform between reindeer, human hybrid (Brain Point), and other forms, each with unique capabilities.
Grants the animal user human-level intelligence and the ability to speak.
